message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $140?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $140. I can do $160, which is a bit higher than your offer, but still a good deal for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $150, as that is closer to what I am able to spend.
